summary: Build a static single-page website titled "Business Development Awareness" with a header, anchor navigation, informational topic cards, and a footer using HTML/CSS.
architectural_notes: Single-page static site using plain HTML + embedded CSS, with in-page anchor navigation (href="#sectionId") to topic sections/cards.

existing_features.title: Create a static, single-page frontend that reproduces the provided HTML content structure in React with TypeScript and Tailwind: a header with title and subtitle, an anchor-based navigation bar, a main section containing five topic cards, and a footer. Use the following exact section IDs for anchor navigation: share, trading, ecommerce, dropshipping, importexport.

Style the page in Tailwind to match the intent of the provided embedded CSS: light gray page background, navy header/footer with white text, a slightly lighter navy nav bar, centered max-width content area, and white cards with rounded corners and subtle shadow. Ensure the layout is responsive (nav wraps on small screens, content remains readable on mobile).

Add one coherent visual theme direction and apply it consistently across the page (color palette, typography scale, spacing, and interactive states), while keeping all user-facing text in English and preserving the meaning/content of the provided sections.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a static single-page "Business Development Awareness" website with header, anchor nav links, five content cards (Share Market, Trading, E-Commerce, Dropshipping, Import & Export), and footer styled with embedded CSS.
